page.title: 15GAMEKEEPING (CONTINUED)
page.content: The{gaming season}starts on the 1st of September.Grouse are the most popular game.About 50% of the birds are shot the others just fly away.Fox,crow and rabbits are shot,snared or gassed because they are{enemies}to gamebirds. There are quite a number of{Roe deer } on the estate which are to be seen in family groups.The game is there primarily for Lord Cowdray and visiting guests.{Germans and Belgians} pay a lot of money to hunt the deer. Mr McHutcheon has worked on the estate for 15 years and has 6 keepers who work with him.His day begins at 6a.m. in the morning and can continue through until 11p.m. at night; especially during incubation times. There are two kinds of dogs kept by the gamekeeper,labradors which retrieve dead game and the spaniels which hunt live game.
